metadata.subject: Agricultural machinery
metadata.title: Make it safe, make it visible : safe transport of farm equipment in Alberta
metadata.creator: Canada West Equipment Dealers Association
Alberta. Alberta Agriculture and Rural Development. Farm Safety Program
Alberta. Alberta Transportation. Vehicle Safety Section
metadata.publisher: Edmonton, Alta. : Alberta Agriculture and Rural Development
metadata.description: "...a joint project between Alberta Agriculture and Rural Development (Farm Safety Program), Alberta Transportation (Vehicle Safety Section) and Canada West Equipment Dealers Association."--Acknowledgements

"This information contained in this publication is presented to assist equipment owners and operators to meet safe operating conditions. It does not replace or supersede the Traffic Safety Act and regulations under the Act and is not a legal document for law enforcement."--inside front cover
